title: Episode 31: Celebrating the Holidays with Trader Joe's Crew - And Cookies!
itunes:title: Celebrating the Holidays with Trader Joe's Crew – And Cookies!
description:
While the holiday season looks a little different this year, the Crew at Trader Joe’s are finding ways to celebrate the best of the season. In this episode, we chat with Crew Members from around the country about their favorite holiday traditions and holiday products at Trader Joe’s. Sparkling wines, multiple hot cocoa options, a cauliflower-centric take on classic latkes, charcuterie for days, candies, and of course cookies… beware, you will want cookies when this one is done!

 

Transcript (PDF)
